Aries: Speedy workflow. You do it fast or not at all.
Taurus: Rituals with pleasure. Slow mornings and skincare routines.
Gemini: Multiple jobs. ADHD planner. Podcasts on loop.
Cancer: Emotional work. Nourishment = part of the routine.
Leo: You need a glamorous routine. Health = sparkle.
Virgo: Queen of systems. Wellness tracker queen.
Libra: Balanced diet. Yoga and cucumber water.
Scorpio: Shadow work in your planner. Health = deep healing.
Sagittarius: Always running (away). Gym or flight? Both.
Capricorn: Disciplined AF. You micromanage your to-do list.
Aquarius: Unusual routines. Biohacking or future diet trends.
Pisces: You forget appointments but dream of wellness. Ocean meditations.
